info.title: Pricing API
info.description:
The `pricing-api` hub sets the foundations for the following Pricing APIs:

### Order API
This api enables the management of orders in epilot 360, providing features such as:
 - Automatic calculation of totals and price breakdowns for taxes on the Order entity
 - Product and pricing data validation

### Shopping Cart API
Used to interact with a cart during a customer's checkout session, providing:
 - An unified data model to model a Shopping Cart
 - Product and pricing data validation
 - Checkout a cart into an order or quote

### Catalog API
Provides a way to query the entire catalog of products and prices.

### Availability API
Provides endpoints for querying products availability by a set of predefined dimensions.

### Spot Market API
Provides endpoints to fetch (historic) spot market price data.

### External Integrations API
Provides endpoints for external integrations. E.g. GetAG.

### External Catalog API
Provides endpoints for external catalog.

### Product Recommendations API
Provides endpoints for product recommendations.

post.description: Computes a set of pricing details that can be persisted on an entity with the pricing capability enabled, e.g: Orders or Contracts.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Order entity ID

post.description:
Checkouts a cart and executes the specified checkout `mode` process.

A Checkout implicitly finalizes the provided cart (if not transient from a fast-checkout) and behaves in one of the following modes:
- `create_order` (**default**): the payment happens at a later date or managed by 3rd-party CRM (SAP)
- `create_invoice`: the payment happens on the online checkout (paypal, stripe, adyen)
- `create_quote`: the checkout represents a price quote request

Fast checkout is also supported, by passing the Cart contents directly.
When a fast checkout is performed the cart is considered transient and there is no cart persistance.

If the checkout `mode` is omitted, the `mode` will default to `create_order`.

get.description: Get a series of historic energy prices for a given time period, market and bidding zone.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Market to use. For now, only day ahead prices are supported.

parameters.name: bidding_zone
parameters.description: Bidding zone to use. For now, only AT and DE-LU are supported.

parameters.name: frequency
parameters.description: Frequency of the price data points in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
Start of price data in ISO 8601 format.
If only a date is provided (YYYY-MM-DD) the timzone of the bidding zone is used.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description:
End of price data in ISO 8601 format.
If only a date is provided (YYYY-MM-DD) the timzone of the bidding zone is used.

404.description: No prices for date range found

These files are used when interacting with products via epilot Journeys, thought the AvailabilityCheck block.

Price.description: The price entity schema for simple pricing

active.description: Whether the price can be used for new purchases.

is_composite_price.description: The flag for prices that contain price components.

pricing_model.description:
Describes how to compute the price per period. Either `per_unit`, `tiered_graduated` or `tiered_volume`.
- `per_unit` indicates that the fixed amount (specified in unit_amount or unit_amount_decimal) will be charged per unit in quantity
- `tiered_graduated` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the price per unit in every range their purchase rises through.
- `tiered_volume` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the same unit price for all purchased units.
- `tiered_flatfee` While similar to tiered_volume, tiered flat fee charges for the same price (flat) for the entire range instead using the unit price to multiply the quantity.
 - `dynamic_tariff` indicates that the price is dynamically dependend on the (quarter)-hourly spot market price.
- `external_getag` indicates that the price is influenced by aquisition fees provided by GetAG.

tiers.description: Defines an array of tiers. Each tier has an upper bound, an unit amount and a flat fee.

description.description: A brief description of the price.

long_description.description: A detailed description of the price. This is shown on the order document and order table.

sales_tax.description:
The default tax rate applicable to the product.
This field is deprecated, use the new `tax` attribute.

tax.description: The default tax rate applied to the price

is_tax_inclusive.description: Specifies whether the price is considered `inclusive` of taxes or not.

type.description: One of `one_time` or `recurring` depending on whether the price is for a one-time purchase or a recurring (subscription) purchase.

billing_period.description: For recurring prices `billing_period` defines the default extent of the recurrence.

unit_amount.description: The unit amount in cents to be charged, represented as a whole integer if possible.

unit_amount_decimal.description: The unit amount in eur to be charged, represented as a decimal string with at most 12 decimal places.

unit_amount_currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase.

price_display_in_journeys.description: Defines the way the price amount is display in epilot journeys.

variable_price.description: The flag for prices that can be influenced by external variables such as user input.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for display purposes and possibly for calculations when the price is variable.

_org_id.description: The organization id the price belongs to

_tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags attached to the price

description.description: A brief description of the price.

unit_amount_currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase.

is_composite_price.description: The flag for prices that contain price components.

_org_id.description: The organization id the price belongs to

_tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags attached to the composite price

entity_id.description: The id of the price component

quantity.description:
By default, the quantity is set to 1, when greater than 1 this value is used as a multiplicative factor.
E.g: 16 x Solar Modules - Premium price.

_tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags attached to the composite price - component relation

MetaData.description: A set of key-value pairs used to store meta data information about an entity.

from.description: The index from which to query, used for pagination purposes. Defaults to 0

size.description: The max size of the response, defaults to 2000.

hydrate.description: When true, enables entity hydration to resolve nested $relation references in-place.

AverageMarketPriceRecord.description: An average market price over a given period in time.

HistoricMarketPriceRecord.description: A market price at a given point in time.

unit_amount.description: Cost in Cents, e.g. 12.3 for 12,3 Cents = 0.123.

authorization_url.description: The URL to obtain OAuth tokens

access_token_expires_at.description: The expiration time of the OAuth access token

IntegrationAuthCredentials.description: The auth credentials for external integrations

ValidateAvailabilityFileResult.description: The availability map file result payload

rules_parsed_count.description: The number of rules successfully parsed

errors.description: The errors found on the file

CartDto.description: A valid cart payload from a client.

source_type.description: type of source, e.g. journey or manual

source_id.description: identifier for source e.g. journey ID

files.description: An array of file IDs, already upload into the File API, that are related with this cart

items.description: a string representing a file ID as received from the File API

CheckoutMode.description: The checkout mode for the cart checkout.

OrderStatus.description:
| status      | description |
|-------------|-------|
| `draft`     | Starting state for all orders, at this point we can still edit the order |
| `quote`     | The order is in a quoting phase, bound to an expiration date |
| `placed`    | The order has been paid and can now be fulfilled (shipped, delivered, complete) or canceled |
| `cancelled` | The order has been cancelled |
| `completed` | The order is now closed and finalized |

BasePriceItemCommon.description: Represents the common keys in BasePriceItem and BasePriceItemDto

quantity.description: The quantity of products being purchased.

description.description: An arbitrary string attached to the price item. Often useful for displaying to users. Defaults to product name.

is_tax_inclusive.description: Specifies whether the price is considered `inclusive` of taxes or not.

PriceItemDto.description: Represents a price input to the pricing library.

type.description: One of `one_time` or `recurring` depending on whether the price is for a one-time purchase or a recurring (subscription) purchase.

unit_amount_decimal.description: The unit amount in eur to be charged, represented as a decimal string with at most 12 decimal places.

is_composite_price.description: The flag for prices that contain price components.

pricing_model.description:
Describes how to compute the price per period. Either `per_unit`, `tiered_graduated` or `tiered_volume`.
- `per_unit` indicates that the fixed amount (specified in unit_amount or unit_amount_decimal) will be charged per unit in quantity
- `tiered_graduated` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the price per unit in every range their purchase rises through.
- `tiered_volume` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the same unit price for all purchased units.
- `tiered_flatfee` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the same unit price for all purchased units.
- `dynamic_tariff` indicates that the price is dynamically dependend on the (quarter)-hourly spot market price.
- `external_getag` indicates that the price is influenced by aquisition fees provided by GetAG.

_price.description: The snapshot of the price linked to the price item.

CompositePriceItemDto.description: Represents a composite price input to the pricing library.

is_composite_price.description: The flag for prices that contain price components.

item_components.description: Contains price item configurations, per price component, when the main price item is a [composite price](/api/pricing#tag/dynamic_price_schema).

price_component_coupon_ids.description: The map of coupon ids applicable to the price components

TaxAmountDto.description: A valid tax rate from a client.

rate.description:
The deprecated tax rate applied.
This field has been deprecated in favor of the new Tax Management. You should use the new tax fields pointing to a proper tax entity.

RecurrenceAmountDto.description: An amount associated with a specific recurrence.

amount_tax.description: Total of all items taxes, with same recurrence.

Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency.
ISO 4217 CURRENCY CODES as specified in the documentation: https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

TotalDetails.description: The total details with tax (and discount) aggregated totals.

amount_shipping.description: This is the sum of all the price item shipping amounts.

breakdown.description: Breakdown of individual tax (and discount) amounts that add up to the totals.

_created_at.description: The creation date for the opportunity

_updated_at.description: The date the coupon was last updated

percentage_value.description: Use if type is set to percentage. The percentage to be discounted, represented as a whole integer.

fixed_value.description: Use if type is set to fixed. The fixed amount in cents to be discounted, represented as a whole integer.

fixed_value_decimal.description: Use if type is set to fixed. The unit amount in eur to be discounted, represented as a decimal string with at most 12 decimal places.

fixed_value_currency.description: Use if type is set to fixed. Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase.

requires_promo_code.description: Whether the coupon requires a promo code to be applied

prices.description: The prices associated with the coupon. Will hold price entities if hydrated, relations otherwise.

id.description: The id of the promo code

code.description: The code of the promo code

has_usage_limit.description: Whether the promo code has a usage limit

usage_limit.description: The usage limit of the promo code

code.description: The promocode inserted by the customer to redeem the promotion

coupons.description: The coupons that got redeemed with received the code

PricingModel.description:
Describes how to compute the price per period. Either `per_unit`, `tiered_graduated` or `tiered_volume`.
- `per_unit` indicates that the fixed amount (specified in unit_amount or unit_amount_decimal) will be charged per unit in quantity
- `tiered_graduated` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the price per unit in every range their purchase rises through.
- `tiered_volume` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the same unit price for all purchased units.
- `tiered_flatfee` While similar to tiered_volume, tiered flat fee charges for the same price (flat) for the entire range instead using the unit price to multiply the quantity.
- `dynamic_tariff` indicates that the price is dynamically dependend on the (quarter)-hourly spot market price.
- `external_getag` indicates that the price is influenced by aquisition fees provided by GetAG.

MarkupPricingModel.description:
Describes how to compute the markup per period. Either `per_unit`, `tiered_volume` or `tiered_flatfee`.
- `per_unit` indicates that the fixed amount (specified in unit_amount or unit_amount_decimal) will be charged per unit in quantity
- `tiered_volume` indicates that the unit pricing will be computed using tiers attribute. The customer pays the same unitary price for all purchased units.
- `tiered_flatfee` While similar to tiered_volume, tiered flat fee charges for the same price (flat) for the entire range instead using the unit price to multiply the quantity.

markup_tiers.description: Defines an array of tiers. Each tier has an upper bound, an unit amount and a flat fee.

additional_markups_enabled.description: Whether the additional markups are enabled

markup_amount.description: The markup amount, configured in Epilot, in cents.

markup_amount_decimal.description: The markup amount, configured in Epilot, as a string with full precision.

markup_amount_net.description: The markup amount net, configured in Epilot, in cents.

markup_amount_net_decimal.description: The markup amount net, configured in Epilot, as a string with full precision.

markup_amount_gross.description: The markup amount gross, configured in Epilot, in cents.

markup_amount_gross_decimal.description: The markup amount gross, configured in Epilot, as a string with full precision.

unit_amount_net.description: The unit amount net for the energy price in cents, it's provided by an external provider.

unit_amount_net_decimal.description: The unit amount net for the energy price as a string with full precision, it's provided by an external provider.

unit_amount_gross.description: The unit amount gross for the energy price in cents, it's provided by an external provider.

unit_amount_gross_decimal.description: The unit amount gross for the energy price as a string with full precision, it's provided by an external provider.
